def_en: If you overpower someone, you manage to take hold of and keep hold of them, although they struggle a lot.

def_cn: （情感等）压倒，使难以承受
def_en: If a feeling overpowers you, it suddenly affects you very strongly.

def_cn: （在体育比赛中）轻松战胜
def_en: In a sports match, when one team or player overpowers the other, they play much better than them and beat them easily.

def_cn: （颜色、气味等）盖过，比…强烈得多
def_en: If something such as a colour or flavour overpowers another colour or flavour, it is so strong that it makes the second one less noticeable.
